post:
Hello, 

I've got some spare space on one of my OVH Montreal, Canada (BHS) servers. Might have some other locations for Black Friday, but don't bet on it. 10 limit. 

<hr> 
Buy:
https://buy.isodme.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=53

<hr>
$3.50/mo, $40/yr, or $115/3 yr
- 1 vCPU (fair share)
- 512 MB RAM
- 1 TB

<hr>
Addons: 
Up to 10 TB storage @ $3/mo/TB
1 GB RAM for $0.50/mo
2 vCPUs at $0.50/mo

<hr>
More Info:
- KVM
- Proxmox
- Stripe/PayPal accepted
- RAIDz1 (ZFS version of RAID 5), so use this for secondary cold backups, as having two disks fail is possible. Expect slow speeds, and you'll be pleasantly suprised
- SSD read caching layer
- Hammering the disk nonstop will lead to I/O limitations 

- Please don't just buy this and request a refund because you want to switch to another BF storage VPS deal, so no refunds

<hr>
About ISODME: 
- We have provided web hosting for web design customers for 2+ years now

<hr>
Let me know if you have any questions or need anything in the comments below.
